review:
We consulted Dr. Chinmaya at Ovum Hospital, Kalyan nagar for enquiring vaccination for my baby. 
She answered our queries patiently. She spent a good amount of time providing suggestions on food, guiding mandatory vaccinations and it's necessities. 

Thanks to the front office as well. They ensured minimal waiting time.
Wonderful staff and doctor who answers are queries with patience and takes good care of  kids.Also the hospital has clean atmosphere where the patients respected.
